title: Hidden Nazis Revealed, Dems Love Big Pharma 9.20.21
itunes:title: Hidden Nazis Revealed, Dems Love Big Pharma 9.20.21
description:
In episode 991, Jack and Miles are joined by the host of the The Beginnings and Couples Therapy podcasts Andy Beckerman to discuss a data breach that exposed the far-right, internal Facebook memos admitting they are part of the Anti-Vaxx problem, Dems love themselves some money, QR codes from joke to essential, fake vaccines cards = big money and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Epik’s data breach means the far-right web is being exposed
  2. More Facebook memos: THEY KNOW THEY ARE PART OF THE ANTI-VAXX PROBLEM
  3. Dems are also greedy pieces of shit
  4. QR Codes Went From Lame Gimmick to a Pandemic Essential
  5. The Fake Vaccine Card Business is Booming!
  6. LISTEN: Injury Reserve - "Jailbreak The Tesla"


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
